title: can you receive a traditional skin through mystery gifting?
body: I have been looking at some of the traditional skins 3D models on lolking and had a question, can I still get these skins, some of them are pretty cool so I wanted to know if I could get them from mystery gifting.

replies.body:
Hey TheVeryVeryBest, 

Yup! Traditional skins are available via Mystery Gifting. 

From the [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ) - 

*A skin for any Champion that your friend owns is eligible for Mystery Gifting, as long as it's worth at least 520 RP and is available in the store. This includes Legendary and even Ultimate skins! Legacy skins will also be obtainable as a Mystery Skin EXCEPT Achievement skins, Collector's Edition skins, PAX skins, Rusty Blitzcrank, Urf the Manatee, Championship Riven and Riot Squad Singed.*
